verses.1: Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Moab mite thum vei a khialh khit, a li veina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh leiseek cianna ah a kizang leikang a zat dingin Edom kumpipaʼ guhte a hal uh hi.
verses.2: Tua ahih ciangin Moab gam sung khempeuh ka kaang tumsak dinga, Kerioth khuapi mun muanhuai teng a kaang tum ding hi. Galkapteʼ otna le peengkul kitumna lak, gal kidona gamlum sungah Moab mite si ding uh hi.
verses.3: Tuate lakah Moab gam ukte ka sisak dinga, a uliante ka that ding hi.
verses.4: Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Judah mite thum vei a khialh khit, a li veina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ka thukhamte nialin ka thuhilhnate zui lo uh hi. A pu a pate un a na biak sa pasian man lote mah in amaute lam pialsak uh hi.
verses.5: Tua ahih ciangin Judah gam sungteng ka kaang tumsak dinga, Jerusalem mun muanhuai teng a kaang tum ding hi.
verses.6: Topa in hih bangin ci hi: Israel mite thum vei a khialh khit, a li veina hangin pel loin amaute gim ka pia ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in leiba a loh zawh loh man bekun midik kimlai zuak uh a, khedap bu khat man a loh zawh loh man bekun mi cimawhte sila-in a zuak uh hi.
verses.7: Amaute in mizawngteʼ lutang leivui lakah tuancil uh a, keima min siangtho a ninsak dingin biakinn-a numei paktatte kiangah tangvalte le papite a pai uh hi.
verses.8: Biakna tau gei khempeuh ah amaute lum uh a, sum leitawina hangin a puan kepsakte uh a phah uh hi. Amaute in a Pasian uhʼ biakinn sungah leibate kiang pan a laksak uh leenggahzu a dawn uh hi.
verses.9: Ahi zongin amaute ka khualna hangin taamtak sing bangin a sang mahmah, tawsaw kung bangin a khauh tuak mahmah Amor mite amau adingin ka suksiatsak a, a dawn pan a kipan a zung dongin ka suk maisak hi.
verses.10: No ka mihingte, Egypt gam pek panin hong paikhiat pihin, gamlak ah kum sawm li sung kong makaih a, note adingin Amor miteʼ gam kong pia hi.
verses.11: Na tapate uh pawl khat kamsang dingin ka teel a, na tangvalte uh pawl khat Nazir mi dingin ka teel hi. Israel aw, tu-a ka gen bangmah hi lo ahi hiam, Topa in kong ci khin hi.
verses.12: Ahi zongin note in Nazir mite leenggahzu na dawnsak uh a, kamsangte in ka thu a gen lohna dingun thu na pia uh hi.
verses.13: Tu-in buhlomte in a pua bawngleeng a netcip suk bangin note na omna mun uh ah kong nengcip suk ding hi.
verses.14: A tai hatte nangawn suakta zo lo dinga, a thahatte a hatna bei dinga, galhangte in amauʼ nuntakna hu zo lo ding uh hi.
verses.15: Thaltawite nangawn in do zo lo dinga, a tai hatte nangawn kisuahtak zo lo dinga, sakol tung tuangte nangawn in a nuntakna suahtak zo lo ding hi.
verses.16: Tua ni ciangin galhang pente nangawn tai mang ding uh hi, Topa in ci hi.
